level.heading: EMS PROVIDERS – EMERGENCY MEDICAL TECHNICIAN – INTERMEDIATE (§9-519)

level.text: 519.1 Each applicant for certification as an Emergency Medicalechnician-Intermediate (EMT-I) shall submit an application to the Director.
A copy of a valid NREMT EMT-I99 (or greater) certification card;
A copy of a valid AHA Health Care Provider (or equivalent) CPR card;
A copy of a valid AHA Advanced Cardiac Life Support (ACLS) card;
A completed application signed by the sponsoring EMS agency’s medicalirector; and
A check or money order made out in the appropriate fee made payable to the.C. Treasurer (if applicable).
519.2 Upon receipt of a complete application, the Director shall review thepplication and, if approved, shall issue a D.C. EMT-I certification card.
